name: Octet
description:
A poem-composing, roguelike fever dream.

Made in 7 days for 7DRL game jam.

Memory of God - Art, design, programming, writing.

NAWKSH - Music, sound, design, word curation.

Using textmode font jpetscii from playscii and Kitchen sink by Polyducks.

##############

Controls:

WASD/Up down left right - move and navigate menus

Enter - confirm/select

Escape - Deselect/exit

Space - wait

i - to access inventory

Cntrl, Shift, Alt, Delete - Word manipulation with word selected

Mouse can also be used in menus.
